inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

on back of board: various notes, inscriptions, labels
markings: on back of board, typed on label [B. Cola di Rienzi. Feb. 1931]; stamped: [copyright F. MATANIA/original to be returned/104 PRIORY ROAD/LONDON, N.W. 6.]
medium: Pen and black ink, black chalk, and gray wash on paper laid down on board
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Cola di Rienzi Surrounded by the People
